titles.title: Providing for a conditional adjournment of the House of Representatives and conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 10/17/2001--Passed Senate without amendment. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from October 17, 2001, until October 23, 2001, and a recess or an adjournment of the Senate from October 17 or 18, 2001, until October 23, 2001.
